thread.title: Courtroom 'decorum?' Not for angry women at Cosby trial

title: Courtroom 'decorum?' Not for angry women at Cosby trial
text:
Courtroom 'decorum?' Not for angry women at Cosby trial   02:05 
Women are disobeying 'courtroom decorum' both inside and outside Bill Cosby's sexual assault retrial in what experts say is an effort to win the case against sexual violence in the court of public opinion. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Women are disobeying 'courtroom decorum' both inside and outside Bill Cosby's sexual assault retrial in what experts say is an effort to win the case against sexual violence in the court of public opinion.
